import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { FiArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/fi' import './styles.css' import logoImg from '../../assets/logo.svg' export default function Register() { const history = useHistory() async function handleRegister(e) { e.preventDefault() const data = { name, email, whatsapp, city, uf, } try { const response = await api.post('ongs', data) alert(`Seu ID de acesso: ${response.data.id}`) history.push('/') } catch (err) { alert('Erro no cadastro, tente novamente') } } return (
